title: Kindness
description:
Zackry Colston, Nina Mozes, and Lindsey Miller share stories about brotherly love, romantic firsts, and an unlikely friendship in North Korea.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Juju Orchestra, Zackry Colston, Team America, Nina Mozes, Greyflood, Lindsey Miller, Naomi Shihab Nye, Madison Cunningham, Ingrid Michaelson, Kevin Allison)
